dialog.speaker: Purple Penguin
dialog.text: Hmm... My friends said they'd be here. Did they leave without me?

dialog.speaker: Green Gecko
dialog.text: Surprise! I was hiding in the sand hehe..

dialog.speaker: Purple Penguin
dialog.text: Nice try buddy.. I've got nerves of steel.

dialog.speaker: Green Gecko
dialog.text: You're no fun.. Btw, where's Bear? Wasn't she coming with you?

dialog.speaker: Bronze Bear
dialog.text: NO WAY! THIS NEW APP ALLOWS YOU TO TELEPORT ANYWHERE YOU WANT!

dialog.speaker: Purple Penguin
dialog.text: LET'S USE IT TO GO TO THE MALL!

dialog.speaker: Green Gecko
dialog.text: Nah, I say let's use it to head to the surf shop..

dialog.speaker: Bronze Bear
dialog.text: How about we enjoy our time here at the beach.
